mapper.update: update smart_labs set labs_name = #{labsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, infos = #{infos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, net_adres = #{netAdres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, labs_num = #{labsNum,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, labs_name, infos, net_adres, port, labs_num from smart_labs
